name: Pacific Storm Allies
description: Pacific Storm: Allies expands upon the success of the internationally acclaimed original to deliver an unforgettable mix of real-time strategy and blistering arcade combat, recreating World War II's most heated battles.
minimum_requirements: Supported OS: Windows Vista/XP/2000/7/8/8.1                     Processor: 2 GHz Processor                      Memory: 512 Mb                     Graphics: DirectX compatible 128 MB graphics card                      DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0c or higher                     Sound: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card                      Hard Drive: 3 GB of free space on disk

reviews.review_text: Great game just wish the Dev's didnt give up on it. It has so much potentiale to it.

it is a great game but the nations need to have more equipment like for instance the americans had more than one type of submarine, multiple aaircraft carier types.  and also if possible have the warships have an array of different ammunition like armor piercing high explosive anitair shells and for the japanese big gun yamamoto have the beehive shells

This game is great in theory, but it has so many gliches. The game continuously crashes at random points during game play. It'd be great if they would update the game or develop a new version of Pacific Storm. This one just has way too many holes in the programming.
This game will not work on steam. Shame on you steam for selling a turd. At least I only lost $4. STAY AWAY, DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.
Absolute rubbish...don't waste time or money. Same can be said for Pacific Storm!!!!

It's a great game, if it didn't crash most of the time. No way to change your controls too.  It has a steep learning curve and when I mean steep, I mean STEEP. There are a lot of button that you have to click before you do this or do that, it's very complex and not for those who are just out to spawn in a bunch of ships and planes on a map and make a battle so huge, that your PC would explode for the sheer amount of ♥♥♥♥ going on.  An otherwise great game ruined by game-breaking bugs and crashes. And did I mention you couldn't change your controls?  Recommend only buying on sale and/or if you're determined to overlook this game's flaws and have patience because it might crash every now and then.
